channel.title: Client Trouble - New Client
channel.description:
I've spent the last month or so working on a custom client for my server which no one knows about or has been on because I’m keeping it under wraps until it's finished...
Though I have had no problems with it since now.
On starting the client, all runs fine.
Start server, all runes fine
Log into server. client crashes and gives me this excuse.
[size=10pt][tt]Loading Can’tTellYouTheNameScape... i3: -1 Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space[/tt][/size]
I have tried many ways to sort it but it is still wrapped up in my head and I cannot cure it. can any of the more "professional" people that have been working on clients longer then me (roughly 5 months) help me out here?
Like, explain what could possibly be causing this error when I log on and how to cure it so I can continue to test my server.

item.title: Client Trouble - New Client
item.dc:creator: @Finnagon Finnagon
item.description:
@Finnagon wrote:

I’ve spent the last month or so working on a custom client for my server which no one knows about or has been on because I’m keeping it under wraps until it’s finished…

Though I have had no problems with it since now.

On starting the client, all runs fine.

Start server, all runes fine

[size=10pt][tt]Loading Can’tTellYouTheNameScape…
i3: -1
Exception in thread “Thread-3” java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space[/tt][/size]

I have tried many ways to sort it but it is still wrapped up in my head and I cannot cure it. can any of the more “professional” people that have been working on clients longer then me (roughly 5 months) help me out here?

Like, explain what could possibly be causing this error when I log on and how to cure it so I can continue to test my server.
